note:
Nebula and BSFA Award finalist author. Editor-in-Chief of Stars and Sabers Publishing.
My upcoming books:
DOOMFLOWER (2025 via Encyclopocalypse Publications)
ATACAMA (2025 via Sley House Publishing).
THE SECRET OF THE SAPPHIRE SENTINEL (2025) and prequel
THE DAWN OF DUSK AND TWILIGHT (2026) via Android Press
Also wrote as J. Dianne Dotson.
Artist. Science Writer.
Married to Gareth L. Powell.
Based in Los Angeles.
(Also at wandering.shop.)
